External factors can have major impacts on the Florida Keys ecosystem.
Storms and climate change factors like rising temparatures, ocean acidification, and sea level rise can cause dramatic shifts without warning.

How can we better prepare for the predicted climate changes coming and improve the resilience of the Florida Keys ecosystems as major storms become increasingly common?
